about_the_game:
Sci-Fi.
Save the universe in the distant future with a fighter jet.

360°2D Shooter.
This is an STG where you fly 360° around the stage and engage in dogfights.
It requires a good feeling of flying a fighter plane and shooting accuracy.

Always Bullet Time.
You have the superpower to stop time every frame.
Your bullets will always hit and your enemies' bullets will always be avoided.
It should be the easiest shooter.
But it is like getting into a car and resisting the urge to step on the gas pedal.

Machine Customization.
You can tune your fighter between stages.
Is it the turning performance, the boost gauge, the ammunition load, or the reload time for each weapon?
Both the operating technique and machine maintenance in racing games are important, and maintenance is not simply a factor that makes you stronger.
The same is true in this game.

DemoVersion.
Episode1 is distributed free of charge until Ending.
This is to fully convey the special experience.
If you like it, please subscribe to our WishList.
We are planning to produce up to Episode3.
(English translation of Episode3 may be delayed)

name: #INNER UNIVERSE 1F0000 Demo
short_description: This 360° STG offers the tension of a dogfight and a turn-based strategy. As a hero with the superpower of time-stopping, you fight, talk, and maintain your aircraft in the inner universe, aiming to save everything in the world.
